translations: 用闪光灯（strobe 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: Strobes and Franks bedrooms and workspaces were on the second and third floors.
sentences.translation: 斯特罗布和弗兰克的卧室和工作间分别在二楼和三楼。

sentences.sentence: If you use external strobes you will now be fitting your base plate and strobe arms.
sentences.translation: 如果你使用的是外闪，现在你可以装配底板和灯臂。

sentences.sentence: Particularly when shooting macro, most, if not all, of your image is lit by your strobes.
sentences.translation: 特别是在拍摄微距的时候，基本上，成像都是依靠外闪的。
